import React, {useEffect , useState} from "react"; import * as userReducer from '../../../../redux/users/user.reducer'; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; import * as userActions from "../../../../redux/users/user.action"; import Spinner from "../../../layout/components/spinner/Spinner"; import {flushSync} from "react-dom"; interface IProps{ } interface IState { users : userReducer.UserState } interface isEditAddressClicked { isEditClicked : boolean } let UserProfile : React.FC = () => { let userState : userReducer.UserState = useSelector((state : IState) => { return state.users }) let [enableEdit , setEnableEdit] = useState({ isEditClicked : false }) let clickEditAddress = (event : React.ChangeEvent) => { setEnableEdit({ isEditClicked : event.target.checked }) } return( userState.loading ? : {/*
{JSON.stringify(userState)}
*/} {/*
{JSON.stringify(enableEdit)}
*/} { Object.keys(userState.user).length > 0 &&

  • Email : {userState.user.email}
  • Mobile : {userState.user.address.phone}

  • Street : {userState.user.address.street}

  • City : {userState.user.address.city}
  • State : {userState.user.address.state}
  • Country : {userState.user.address.country}
  • Pin : {userState.user.address.pin}
